content:
the 2nd search bar appears to be missing.

Not sure what you're talking about. Don't you have a search bar at the top of the main window? Also see https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/unified-toolbar

Please post a screenshot illustrating your problem. https://support.mozilla.org/kb/how-do-i-create-screenshot-my-problem
creator: christ1

content: What is your Thunderbird version? What is your account type - POP or IMAP?
